snippet: Wasn't senior-friendly Florida supposed to be Newt Gingrich territory? Will his campaign survive defeat there?
abstract: Wasn't senior-friendly Florida supposed to be Newt Gingrich territory? Will his campaign survive defeat there?

byline.original: By DAVID BROOKS and GAIL COLLINS

lead_paragraph: David Brooks: Newt Gingrich never should have messed with Saul Alinsky. All across Florida old geezers were hearing Gingrich rage against Alinsky and they were thinking, "Alinsky, Alinsky, I think that's the guy I play bingo with in Boca. Seems like a perfectly nice fella. If Gingrich hates him, I think I'll vote for Mitt."
